item.title: 🔴 01:36 Air alarm to Chernihiv region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:36 Air alarm to Chernihiv region follow the following messages.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
